title: Happens-before reasoning applied to some examples

reasoning to check that writes are visible to subsequent reads.

title: To analyse this completely, we need to consider all of the possible interleavings of the statements in thread one and thread two. Instead, we will consider just two of them.

read-volatile(a), read(b)             // third thread
